queries.name: Twisted Bilayer Graphene
queries.search_query: ti:"twisted bilayer graphene" OR abs:"twisted bilayer graphene" AND cat:cond-mat.*

queries.name: Moiré Phonons
queries.search_query: ti:"moire phonon" OR abs:"moire phonon" AND cat:cond-mat.*

queries.name: Twisted/Moiré TMD
queries.search_query: (ti:"twisted TMD" OR ti:"moire TMD" OR ti:"twisted MoS2" OR ti:"twisted WSe2") AND cat:cond-mat.*

queries.name: Electron-Phonon Coupling
queries.search_query: (ti:"electron-phonon coupling" OR abs:"electron-phonon coupling") AND cat:cond-mat.*
